subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: José López drove in Ichiro Suzuki with a double in the 11th inning that eluded a leaping Manny Ramírez at the left-field wall as the Seattle Mariners defeated the visiting Boston Red Sox yesterday, 2-1.
snippet: José López drove in Ichiro Suzuki with a double in the 11th inning that eluded a leaping Manny Ramírez at the left-field wall as the Seattle Mariners defeated the visiting Boston Red Sox yesterday, 2-1.
